Name: Radhanagar Beach, Havelock Island (Andaman and Nicobar Islands)
Nearest Bus Stand: No bus stand available on Havelock Island
Nearest Airport: Veer Savarkar International Airport, Port Blair (approx. 55 km by sea and road)
Best Time to Visit: November to May (pleasant weather and clear sea)
Accessibility: Accessible by ferry from Port Blair; road transport on the island available; wheelchair-friendly beach access limited due to natural terrain
Guided Tours: Available through local operators, mainly in English and Hindi
Parking: Available at ferry points on Havelock Island; charges vary (₹20-₹50)
Nearby Amenities: Resorts, cafes, small eateries, shops, restrooms
Special Notes: Famous for spectacular sunsets; awarded Asia’s Best Beach in 2004 by Time Magazine; pristine coral reefs ideal for snorkeling and diving.

Name: Cellular Jail, Port Blair (Andaman and Nicobar Islands)
Nearest Bus Stand: Phoenix Bay Bus Stand, Port Blair (approx. 3 km)
Nearest Airport: Veer Savarkar International Airport, Port Blair (approx. 5 km)
Best Time to Visit: October to May (pleasant weather for sightseeing)
Accessibility: Easily accessible by road; mostly wheelchair-friendly with ramps and paved paths
Guided Tours: Available in multiple languages including English and Hindi; audio guides offered
Parking: Available near the site; free or nominal charges
Nearby Amenities: Cafes, souvenir shops, restrooms, small parks
Special Notes: Known as "Kala Pani," a colonial prison used by British to imprison freedom fighters; Light and Sound Show available in evenings depicting historical narratives.

Name: Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park, Wandoor (Andaman and Nicobar Islands)
Nearest Airport: Veer Savarkar International Airport, Port Blair (approx. 30 km)
Timings: 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM (seasonal closures may apply)
Entry Fee: ₹100 per person (additional fees for snorkeling and boat rides)
Best Time to Visit: November to May (clear weather ideal for marine activities)
Accessibility: Accessible by road; moderate trekking involved for some islands; not fully wheelchair-friendly
Guided Tours: Available, including snorkeling and glass-bottom boat tours with multilingual guides
Parking: Available at Wandoor jetty; nominal charges
Nearby Amenities: Basic restaurants, restrooms, souvenir shops near entrance
Special Notes: Includes several islands with coral reefs and diverse marine life; snorkeling and scuba diving popular; eco-conservation efforts ongoing.

Name: Chidiya Tapu, Port Blair (Andaman and Nicobar Islands)
Nearest Bus Stand: Aberdeen Bus Stand, Port Blair (approx. 15 km)
Nearest Airport: Veer Savarkar International Airport, Port Blair (approx. 15 km)
Best Time to Visit: November to February (migratory birds and pleasant weather)
Accessibility: Accessible by road; wheelchair-friendly pathways limited
Special Notes: Known as the "Sunset Point"; famous for birdwatching with species like sea eagles and kingfishers; also called the "Bird Island."

Name: Ross Island, Port Blair (Andaman and Nicobar Islands)
Nearest Bus Stand: Aberdeen Bus Stand, Port Blair (approx. 3 km to jetty)
Nearest Airport: Veer Savarkar International Airport, Port Blair (approx. 5 km)
Accessibility: Accessible by boat; walking required on uneven terrain; limited wheelchair access
Guided Tours: Available with English and Hindi-speaking guides
Nearby Amenities: Cafes and shops near jetty area
Special Notes: Former British administrative headquarters with ruins; known for deer sightings and historical buildings; underwater coral reefs nearby.

Name: Neil Island (Shaheed Dweep), Andaman District (Andaman and Nicobar Islands)
Nearest Bus Stand: No bus stand available on Neil Island
Nearest Airport: Veer Savarkar International Airport, Port Blair (approx. 40 km by sea and road)
Accessibility: Accessible by ferry; road transport on island available; relatively easy terrain; limited wheelchair access
Guided Tours: Local guides available; mostly in English and Hindi
Parking: Available at ferry points; nominal charges
Special Notes: Known for its coral reefs, natural rock formations, and tranquil beaches; less crowded than Havelock.
